parameters.prompt: synthwave, nostalgic, dreamy, retro-futurism, electric piano, arpeggiator, lo-fi beats
parameters.lyrics: [verse] Neon signs flicker like distant stars / The hum of the city fades into the dark / Ghosts of the past dance on broken glass / Echoes of a melody we used to know [chorus] We’re driving through the night / Headlights painting time / The future’s just a shadow / But we’ll make it glow [verse] Static whispers on the radio / A song we loved a lifetime ago / The streets are empty, but the skyline breathes / A heartbeat buried underneath [chorus] We’re driving through the night / Headlights painting time / The future’s just a shadow / But we’ll make it glow [bridge] Turn the dial, catch a frequency / A voice from 1983 / It hums a tune we can’t forget / A love we haven’t found yet [outro] The highway hums a lullaby / Dawn is bleeding in the sky / We’ll sleep when the last light dies
